move_details.name: seed bomb
move_details.description: Hurls a large seed at the designated area, dealing damage to opposing Pokémon in the area of effect.
move_details.upgrade: lvl 5 - to Sludge Bomb or Giga Drain

move_details.name: sludge bomb
move_details.description: Hurls unsanitary sludge to the designated area, dealing damage over time to opposing Pokémon in the area of effect and decreasing their movement speed and Sp. Def for a short time
move_details.upgrade: lvl 11 - increase area of effect

move_details.name: gigan drain
move_details.description: Hurls unsanitary sludge to the designated area, dealing damage over time to opposing Pokémon in the area of effect and decreasing their movement speed and Sp. Def for a short time
move_details.upgrade: lvl 13 - increase the amount of HP restored

move_details.name: razor leaf
move_details.description: Launches many sharp-edged leaves in a quick succession of attacks, dealing damage to opposing Pokémon in the area of effect.
move_details.upgrade: lvl 7 - to Solar Beam or Petal Dance

move_details.name: solar beam
move_details.description: Blasts a bundled beam of light, dealing damage to opposing Pokémon in the area of effect.
move_details.upgrade: lvl 10 - reduce time charging and reduce cooldown

move_details.name: petal dance
move_details.description: Scatters petals around the user, increasing movement speed for a short time and dealing damage over time to opposing Pokémon in the area of effect.
move_details.upgrade: lvl 11 - increase area of effect

move_details.name: verdant anger
move_details.description: Launches a giant seed toward the designated area. The seed then splits apart, dealing damage to opposing Pokémon in the area of effect and decreasing their movement speed for a short time.

move_details.name: flame burst
move_details.description: Attacks with a bursting flame, leaving opposing Pokémon burned.
move_details.upgrade: lvl 5 - to Flamethrower or Fire Punch

move_details.name: flamethrower
move_details.description: Attacks with an intense blast of fire, leaving opposing Pokémon burned.
move_details.upgrade: lvl 5.5 - increase damage

move_details.name: fire punch
move_details.description: Attacks with a heavy punch and unleashes damage. It can burn Pokémon pushed back by it
move_details.upgrade: lvl 11 - reduce cooldown every time a basic attack hit

move_details.name: fire spin
move_details.description: Encircles opposing Pokémon in the area of effect with a vortex of fire, also decreasing their movement speed for a short time.
move_details.upgrade: lvl 7 - to Fire Blast or Flare Blitz

move_details.name: fire blast
move_details.description: Blass intense, all-consuming fire, dealing damage over time to opposing Pokémon while the flames continue to burn on the ground and decreasing the movement speed of opposing Pokémon for a short time.
move_details.upgrade: lvl 8 - increase damage

move_details.name: flare blitz
move_details.description: Charges forward cloaked in fire, throwing opposing Pokémon. This also grants the user a shield.
move_details.upgrade: lvl 13 - decrease movement speed of opposing Pokemon for a short time when they are thrown by this move

move_details.name: seismic slam
move_details.description: Flies into the air and shoots down attacks. Ends with a grab of the opponent and throwing them to the ground

move_details.name: thunder shock
move_details.description: Releases electricity, dealing damage to opposing Pokémon in the area of effect. Also paralyzes opposing Pokémon for a short time.
move_details.upgrade: lvl 4 - to Electro Ball or Thunder

move_details.name: electro ball
move_details.description: Hurls an electric orb, dealing damage to opposing Pokémon in the area of effect and leaving them paralyzed for a short time. This move's damage increases the lower the opposing Pokémon's remaining HP is
move_details.upgrade: lvl 11 - increase damage

move_details.name: thunder
move_details.description: Drops wicked thunderbolts, dealing damage to opposing Pokémon in the area of effect.
move_details.upgrade: lvl 11 - increase the number of time this move attacks.

move_details.name: electrowebb
move_details.description: Attacks and captures opposing Pokémon using an electric net, leaving them unable to move.
move_details.upgrade: lvl 6 - to Volt Tackle or Thunderbolt

move_details.name: volt tackle
move_details.description: Has the user electrify itself and charge ahead, throwing opposing Pokémon
move_details.upgrade: lvl 13 - reduce cooldown

move_details.name: thunderbolt
move_details.description: Attacks with a strong electric blast, dealing damage to opposing Pokémon in the area of effect and leaving them unable to act.
move_details.upgrade: lvl 13 - increase damage

move_details.name: thunderstorm
move_details.description: Attacks opposing Pokémon near the user with tremendous bolts of lightning.

move_details.name: Powder Snow
move_details.description: Attacks with a chilly gust of powdery snow, decreasing the movement speed of opposing Pokémon for a short time when it hits.
move_details.upgrade: lvl 4 - to Avalance or Dazzling Gleam

move_details.name: electro ball
move_details.description: Hurls an electric orb, dealing damage to opposing Pokémon in the area of effect and leaving them paralyzed for a short time. This move's damage increases the lower the opposing Pokémon's remaining HP is
move_details.upgrade: lvl 11 - increase damage

move_details.name: thunder
move_details.description: Drops wicked thunderbolts, dealing damage to opposing Pokémon in the area of effect.
move_details.upgrade: lvl 11 - increase the number of time this move attacks.

move_details.name: electrowebb
move_details.description: Attacks and captures opposing Pokémon using an electric net, leaving them unable to move.
move_details.upgrade: lvl 6 - to Volt Tackle or Thunderbolt

move_details.name: volt tackle
move_details.description: Has the user electrify itself and charge ahead, throwing opposing Pokémon
move_details.upgrade: lvl 13 - reduce cooldown

move_details.name: thunderbolt
move_details.description: Attacks with a strong electric blast, dealing damage to opposing Pokémon in the area of effect and leaving them unable to act.
move_details.upgrade: lvl 13 - increase damage

move_details.name: thunderstorm
move_details.description: Attacks opposing Pokémon near the user with tremendous bolts of lightning.
